lender.name: Melonie
lender.loan_because: micro-entrepreneurs are treated with dignity, and just a small loan can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: formerly corporate finance, and now passionate about microfinance

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I fix broken networks XD

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I have always donated money and never knew if the right people were being helped; very impersonal. Thanks to this organization, now I can see exactly who I am helping.
lender.occupational_info: I am a CPA by profession, but I am currently employed as an administrator for a public university.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life and I have enough of what I need. It's such a simple thing to give money away!

lender.name: Wumpy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be happy.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: people can make a difference.

lender.name: Adelle
lender.loan_because: I know that the only way can change the world is one person at a time, and that it is my duty to do my share to help repair this broken world. For me it is a mitzvah, and one I do gladly. .
lender.occupational_info: I am a disabled 46 year old Jewish woman who lives in an Assisted Living Complex with 2 canaries and an old pug dog. I like to study, play computer games and listen to talking books. When i am not doing that work, I am painting Judaic Folk Art.

lender.name: Felipe & Lynn
lender.loan_because: Queremos hacer una diferencia en la vida de la gente
lender.occupational_info: We love people!

lender.name: Torre and Ken
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to advance themselves to a better living.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupation: Consultant: Marketing & PR for the travel industry

lender.name: Simms Family
lender.loan_because: IWe know how hard is to start a business or earn an income on your own for your family.
lender.occupational_info: Provide commercial and residential pest control services and home inspections to local communities.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach eight-year olds to be compassionate, educated people.

lender.name: Jason Boutwell
lender.loan_because: The older I get the more I realize how lucky I (we) are to live in a prosporus nation where opportunity and freedom are expected and taken for granted. We are blessed and I figure it is our duty to share the opportunity to create freedom to those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I help others improve thier business thru a better understanding of technology.

lender.name: Frédéric
lender.loan_because: "Aide toi et le ciel t'aidera" Jean de la Fontaine.

lender.name: Janiedoe
lender.loan_because: I realize I am very lucky to not have to worry about tomorrow. Unfortunately, many people across the world are not so fortunate. I hope lending some money via Kiva will make a difference for some of them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large international computer company. My job is to solve other people's computer and network problems.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I can, and got more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: Business process IT support and development in a world wide company.

lender.name: Øyvind
lender.loan_because: To make a difference for somebody.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in Primary school and a nature photographer on the spare time.

lender.name: Gro
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-loans are an effective way of helping people..

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Veronika
lender.occupational_info: I teach anatomy and fysiology to students in Norway who goes to school to become beauty therapists. www.hudpleieakademiet.no

lender.name: Jonstad
lender.loan_because: I'm bored

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to live free and with dignity, by making their own money.

lender.name: Svanhild
lender.loan_because: I belive that all humans need to keep their dicnity and respect. Giving loan to people who need money in order to get a better life, is helping in a respectful and dignity manner.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to ensure that contractors, in oil buisness, supply all necessary documentation needed for drifting and maintaining the equipment/installation in a safely and effecient way.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: It is important for each of us to give back in whatever way we can. Where we live, there is so much excess and waste, and in so many other places in the world,they would be shocked by our cavalier attitude towards all that we have. I believe that so much can be done, even through small efforts. This organization is a brilliant idea. My 9 year old daughter and I read through all the profiles listed to see which one resonated with us. Since I am in the food service world, it felt right to help someone doing the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate two coffee houses.

lender.name: Dada700
lender.loan_because: i think it can change a life ..
lender.occupational_info: Promotional activities on the internet.

lender.name: edgar
lender.loan_because: Its nice to help other people if we can .
lender.occupational_info: I have my own cleaning company

lender.name: Atle
lender.loan_because: diversity will always be part of all societies, but I want to do my small share of equaling out the largest differences.

lender.name: Sascha
lender.loan_because: it can make such a difference in someone's life, if you just handout that chance for them.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance in the north-west of Holland. I like my job very much because I love helping people.

lender.name: Tracee
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves instead of giving money to an organization that uses most of the money for administrative costs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer and voice teacher. I have a little organization called PeaceLoveMusic and I am not so much of a philanthropist, but I like this idea.

lender.name: Marco Sposato
lender.loan_because:
Better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.
Chinese Proverb

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe that big changes start with small steps.

lender.name: Rachel

lender.name: Kloppers Family

lender.name: Maaike
lender.loan_because: I am in the lucky position to be able to help people

lender.name: Marte

lender.name: Uno

lender.name: Carol

lender.occupational_info: I help companies promote their business by facilitating their advertising messages in a target specific magazine, website and event.

lender.name: Gypsy Mountain
lender.occupation: Respiratory Therapist and Small business owner
lender.loan_because: I am a struggling new business owner and I want to help other businesses!
lender.occupational_info: In May of 2010 I opened a small out of the way consignment shop. In May of 2011 I moved to a much larger store on the main street! The store now is a Boutique. Including designer clothing, an Artisan's gallery and upscale consignment . I have managed to do all this and slowly grow my business without a loan ( so far....!) and would like to give back in small ways as a thank you for the blessings I have received.

lender.name: Cathrine
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and share what I have.
lender.occupational_info: Public servant, working in the Norwegian Immigration department

lender.name: Stan

lender.name: Laurie

lender.occupational_info: As a paralegal, I assist attorneys with legal work on behalf of our clients.

lender.loan_because: It appears to be much more transparent and immediately productive and effective.

lender.name: Robbert
lender.loan_because: it's good for all of us

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity to succeed in their personal and/or professional endeavors. In addition, I hope these loans would help raise their living standards as well as the people around them.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I can. I should. I must.
lender.occupational_info: Seventh Grade Teacher

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it's the best way to help people in need.

lender.name: Nichole
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can do something to help another person out. This is my something.

lender.name: Aleksandra
lender.loan_because: I think it's better to give a fishing rod than a fish
lender.occupational_info: I'm a happy wife of a nice guy and a mother of the finest daughter in the world :-)

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupation: I am the CEO of WebPromotion.com
lender.loan_because: KIVA to me is a great way to help and empower people around the world. Social networking with a purpose.
lender.occupational_info:
Collective Creative Marketing, Business Networking - Powered by SEO
GrassRoots Business Networking is a collective marketing method for like-minded business people who understand the advantage of combining marketing with business networking and helping others.
I work with other web designers and promoters and love to connect the dots around the world of people helping one another. - Twitter.com/markgrassroots

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I cannot change the global system and the division between the fortunate and less fortunate but I can try to make a difference on an individual basis
lender.occupational_info: I teach students (aged 18-25) foreign languages, hopefully giving a better understanding of other cultures too!

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because:
I know how it feels to need just a little help to solve a problem. I hope that the small amount I can loan will make a big difference for someone else.
I also love to watch the sucess of these businesses and projects.
lender.occupational_info: I help plan new programs for the courts in Colorado.

lender.name: jose m.
lender.loan_because: I love to help latin developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: aircraft mechanic

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make a living for there own.
lender.occupational_info: I am a buyer for a large company. I negotiate longterms contracts on serveral products and services.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: person to person connections will do more for peace in this world than governments will ever manage.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading comprehension and character education to boys and girls in the local middle school.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It's a way to make a very direct impact, with a sense of real people instead of simply a faceless charity.

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: must there really be e reason to share? ;-)
lender.occupational_info: Polish girl living in Norway.Working at airline office + have my own webshop

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward ...
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are deaf as well as blind and mentally disabled. They live together in a special house and me and co-workers are there around the clock to take care of them.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money by U.S. standards can have a big impact elsewhere in the world. We have so much here, it is only right that we give a hand up to those who are less privileged.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients buy, sell, lease and mortgage commercial real estate.

lender.name: Donald D. DeLo
lender.loan_because: I care to be socially responsible. Quiero ser socialmente responsable.
lender.occupational_info: Retired corporate employee and world traveller who is now a real estate investor.

lender.name: Corriedawn
lender.loan_because: I want people who want to improve their lives to be given the opportunity. When I needed help in my life, people were there for me, including strangers.
lender.occupational_info: I assist an attorney who helps people who were injured recover money for the medical and financial losses due to the injury. We primarily are fighting insurance companies who often dont treat people like humans, but instead like line items on an accountant's spread sheet.

lender.name: Tomi
lender.loan_because: My friend requested that loans were given to Kiva in lieu of wedding gifts. I really liked that idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sixth grade mathematics teacher in a public middle school in Texas.

lender.name: Ingo, Cologne
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm sure that this project works and the money will support people directly.

lender.name: Adam&Chris
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference by helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Adam is a university engineering student and his Dad works with entrepreneurs in Canada.

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: micro-credits empower people to be self-reliant.

lender.name: Elin
lender.loan_because: I want to! ;)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in local structures and empowerment.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Someone far away needs this money much more than me.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories and edit copy for publications and Web sites.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I feel that I can help someone in need directly, even though that person may be thousands of miles away.

lender.name: John & Bette
lender.occupational_info: In the States, we work for government programs to promote economic development and jobs, and provide social services.

lender.name: Lee & Sherry
lender.loan_because: We're fortunate. We've been there. We've seen the real difference a little bit of support can make.
lender.occupational_info: Lee is a career US Soldier Statesman. Sherry is a career expert wife and mother. We have spent most of the last 28 years in Africa and Europe and we are very, very blessed.

lender.name: Ko van Hespen
lender.occupational_info: I work for the UN in The Hague, Netherlands - working with graphics and photography

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I saw an inspiring article documenting young people doing altruistic work and was led to make a small difference myself.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: When you help a man, or a woman, a family or a community, it benefits the entire world. We are providing the tools for these borrowers to realize their own dreams through their own visions, capabilities and hard work. By helping them change their world one dream at a time our world is also changed. We share their success through the harmony brought by empowerment and that increased harmony affects families, communities and even countries. My hope is that this activity will help the world will become a kinder and gentler place.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the recording of the financial information of our Company. This information must be presented so management will understand the results of past operations and be able to make appropriate future decisions regarding how to utilize the resources of our Company most effectively. I am also responsible for the collection of amounts due to our Company and for the correct and timely payment of our bills.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I like the thought of helping someone to help themselves. And I believe that people who are involved in these kind of projects are among the people who really make an effort to improve their own and their family's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a process industry which produce metal for building and other purposes.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: i want to share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work with disabled children to aid their ability to participate fully and learn skills at school.

lender.name: Earl
lender.loan_because: Helping others to help themselves.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: It's way cool. It feels good to fight poverty and make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Helping organizations implement software to manage employee records

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student (economics) at Clark University.

lender.name: erica & gert
lender.loan_because: We are blessed not to have worries about tomorrow. Unfortunately, many people across the world are not so fortunate. I hope lending a little bit of money through Kiva will make a big difference for some of them.
lender.occupational_info: I try to figure out solutions to produce various products in the best way.

lender.name: Katelyn
lender.loan_because: This loan is being offered on behalf of my daughter. In the past she has done great things for people in need. While in middle school, she raised money to send holiday gifts to children in impoverished countries. She raised money in high school to purchase all the apartment needs for a refuge' family who was being etablished in our area. She worked with her religious group in high school to spend time in the summer helping in needy areas around us. She spent time doing missionary work in Ecuador the summer after senior year of high school. She is an inspiration, showing what one person can do to help! I hope to continue her good work and ideas in supporting the KIVA program in her name.
lender.occupational_info: College student studying photography.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: We are our brothers keepers

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is unfair that people is unable to do something about their lives caused by a rigid economic system in this world.
lender.occupational_info: My work is on a oil-rig in the North Sea. I inject cuttings from the well back to the ground with high pressure pumps.

lender.name: ståle
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Dominique
lender.loan_because: It's a worthy cause. Why would anyone not want to help?
lender.occupational_info: fixing broken hearts, day by day and night by night

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to make a difference in someone's life. I love the idea of helping other people help themselves.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I can. When given the ability to directly help someone in another country, why wouldn't I?

lender.name: Rachelle
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives me the opportunity to loan to very deserving people from across the world! I get to help out people whom I've never met and probably never will . . . and that's amazing!!

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: it's a nice thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sit on a drilling rig and look at rocks

lender.name: Liv Helèn
lender.loan_because: I want to see where my money goes. And i Want to help other Womens. Simply to give and efford to those Who wants to make a life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in ER.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: it's an awesome way to help someone.

lender.name: Dwayne
lender.loan_because: I want to try help some one that needs a loan to get ahead when using the money wisely.
lender.occupational_info: Its not easy to find this amount of trust to do something like lend dollars but when you get your money put back in your account you feel good the cycle is completed.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: To make the world a better place.

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: I am a student of haute couture and I put my internet booths, which is why I need $ 600 dollars, please help me with this money, repayable in 12 months reason for 50 dollars per month, many thanks, I finish my studies and I have no money, thank you thank you
lender.occupational_info: My cordial greetings to the entire world, in fact I am working from home, but I have always tried to leave my home country Peru, it has never succeeded, because I ask for an employment contract for another country (SPAIN, ITALY, SWITZERLAND) where I say it's easier to make this process at any embassy in LIma-PERU; am a province JAEN-CAJAMARCA and my patron has a local wants to give it to me to put my booths internet, I hope their prompt assistance .. .

lender.name: Christen
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I am directly helping some one in need. I have been blessed so much and, in return, I want to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I dispense medications in a hospital, taking care that they are safe, prepared correctly, and appropriate for each individual patient.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that a loan can help someone's business get off the ground. A little bit can go a long way.

lender.name: Katrine
lender.loan_because: It feels nice to help someone...

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: Because I have been given much, I too, must share

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Easily I could have been one of the recipients in need.
lender.occupational_info: Been a local volunteer for 10 years to various entities.

lender.name: Anand
lender.loan_because: To help someone in need is the greatest gift of all. People in the US have too much, and it is humbling each time I make a loan. I also want to support earth-friendly, animal-friendly entrepreneurs. I also support women's rights and issues, as it is crucial for a country to develop.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance industry.

lender.name: Tomás
lender.loan_because: 1it accelerates learning, 2 these people fight global warming ( local produced food) 3 they inspire others. 4 Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love. Lao Tzu

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I'd like to be able to track the people I am helping, put a face to a cause. I also know that micro-financing has a proven track record in helping entrepreneur move out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people remove road blocks in their lives.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to celebrate all the fabulous women in my life!

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: I teach grade 7 and 8 students in an elementary school.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Its a blessings to help people on their journey.

lender.name: Chandra
lender.loan_because: A rising tide lifts all boats.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it helps people help themselves!

lender.name: Ernesto
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro finance.

lender.name: Su Yin
lender.loan_because: Hard work pays dividends
lender.occupational_info: I design magazines and the occasional website.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I have nothing better to do
lender.occupational_info: research/investagaciones

lender.name: Andres
lender.loan_because: this makes a difference in the world one transaction at a time.

lender.name: Ernst
lender.loan_because: Me and my family think this is a fantastic idea to help people in need. We really hope this works.
lender.occupational_info: ICT Operations

lender.name: Greg and Kim
lender.loan_because: All deserve opportunity
lender.occupational_info: We teach college students and faculty to empower themselves.

lender.name: Jemma
lender.loan_because: We are much more materialistic + fortunate than our society seems to believe... we need a constant reminder of real people less fortunate to put things into perspective.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I admire people with initiative who are trying to make a better life for themselves, their families and their communities. It is fun to support and encourage other small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: We help other companies with their computer systems.

lender.name: Tschäff
lender.loan_because: Kiva's charity gives people's businesses a competitive edge over other's in the local economy with their lower interest rates. It's sure to put the dumber people out of work, and bring the stress of capitalism to 3rd world people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: Make sure the smart people do well, and the dumb ones live a life of poverty, where they'll need ten children to support them in retirement, exponentially exacerbating the strain on the natural resources for many generations.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: My parents taught me to be grateful for and generous with my resources.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to help students at the University of Minnesota afford their education.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher for at-risk youth.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: where we are born and the resources we have to work with are a matter of luck. what we do with our lives, what we make of ourselves - this is what matters.

lender.name: Karen & George
lender.loan_because: we really like making direct impact in helping someone improve his/her life.
lender.occupational_info: Karen teaches English at a community college, and George is a self-employed architect who also teaches architecture part-time at a community college.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: my son told me about this wonderful site.

lender.name: M and L
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to earn a living.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to not only give something back, but to see how our loans directly and indirectly impact people all over the world when people spend their loan proceeds with other local merchants.
lender.occupational_info: I design, install and support computer networks which allow computers to communicate with other computers all over the world.

lender.name: fiammetta venner
lender.loan_because: Didn't find yet.
lender.occupational_info: Didn't find yet.

lender.name: Marit
lender.loan_because: I'm a single mother with teenage daughter and only part-time work and think it must be so much harder for others in poor countries in similar circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: At moment working part-time in office administration but would like to get back into doing my art full-time and make living from that.

lender.name: AHMAD OMAR ANABTAWI
lender.loan_because: I believe that every one deserves a chance in life.

lender.name: Damon
lender.loan_because: building local business capacity is the best way to fight poverty, which is crucial to community and youth development.
lender.occupational_info: I am a youth community organizer working within Canada. Currently my location is Ottawa, and I am currently affiliated with Canada World Youth as an participant.

lender.occupational_info: Olaf: Creative online consultant Marjolijn: Manager

lender.occupational_info: Geir works as a computer programmer consultant. Agnes work part time as an personal assistant to a disabled person. Eli Anne is playing as children should do.

lender.name: yousuf
lender.loan_because: For the sake of Allah
lender.occupational_info: If God wills

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: My work is to assign capital to profitable investments. This is the best "capital allocation" I've done so far....
lender.occupational_info: I invest private clients money in the financial markets.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I can... And because of the old "Give a man a fish and feed him for a day. Teach him how to fish, and feed him for a lifetime."
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Brett Jensen
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is a wonderful way to help people out. Our small efforts can have massive positive impact on hard-working entrepreneurs in developing countries. I see Kiva as a way to "leverage" our efforts to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: A fantastic idea, a way to give purpose to our lives!

lender.name: DANIEL
lender.loan_because: It's Vital to a More Just and Equitable World
lender.occupational_info: Life science Ingeneering and GMP's consultant - Quality System Implementation

lender.name: Zana
lender.loan_because: I'm incredibly lucky to have been born in such a wonderful country with so many opportunities. I give because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I own a successful restaurant where I am also the chef.

lender.name: Noel & Ingrid
lender.loan_because: we want to help and share!!

lender.name: Bjørn
lender.loan_because: I support entrepreneurship as the best way to help people help themselves. Ideas and enthusiasm should not be limited by access to supporting capital.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I want to help give someone the ability to be more self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Sponsorship Organization

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: loans create social and economics value. to encourage private initiatives in the part of the world which needs the most.
lender.occupational_info: Make the people to work together, servicing the best our customers.

lender.name: Dipankar & Rosalind
lender.loan_because: We are entrepreneurs and we understand the trials and tribulations of being an entrepreneur. Therefore, we like to help fellow entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We run online and offline businesses that focus on the travel, pet and tech industries.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Social Justice
lender.occupational_info: I help women find safe options, heal from abuse and become empowered.

lender.name: Claudine
lender.loan_because: I like to help

lender.name: kjartan
lender.loan_because: Make a better life for someone who need it

lender.name: Duane and Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need a little help from time to time. Without the help of others I would not have been able to do the things I have done in my life.
lender.occupational_info: The most rewarding work I have ever done. I get to educate children and teach them about the amazing world in which we live in.

lender.name: Dominga
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way for people who just need a little support to be able to do what they want to do to make their own living an this way become strong and independent.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people who are (temporarily) not able to perform their own way.

lender.name: Randal
lender.loan_because: I am self-employed and wish to help others who want to work to grow their own business
lender.occupational_info: I provide computer and network sales and support services to a variety of small business clients

lender.name: Randi
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: It more more sense to me to empower people to help themselves rather than donate money that that makes people more dependent. Increased feelings of pride and self worth potentially come from creating a continued way to work and live through these loans. I think that means more than any free gift.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Help people to help themselves

lender.name: The Bergerson Family
lender.loan_because:
We feel proud to be a part of helping other people around the world reach their goals. A small donation can make a world of difference to someone in need.
-The Bergerson Family

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born in a rich country where I benefited from free state education and healthcare. I am now able to assist others financially and would like to help others who find themselves born into less fortunate conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I defend people who have been accused of committing crimes. I specialise in helping motorists save their entitlement to drive.

lender.name: Hank
lender.loan_because: people need money
lender.occupational_info: I play

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: I loan because this is the 1st project that gave me a "good feeling". And 100% of my money is 100% invested.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Teleplan. I am the Logistics Coordinator for CISCO World Wide Return Logistics in Europe.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: people need help and I want to help them. they are in poor places and need money.
lender.occupational_info: I do shoe-shines, massages ,shine silver and car washes to make money. :]

lender.name: Tunia&Erik
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to support others in achieving their goals.

lender.name: Benedikte
lender.loan_because: It`s simple really; I wish to help those who are less fortunate that me. Personal involvement in microcredit seems like an ideal way to attack poverty.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to chase a dream.
lender.occupational_info: Set the bar high. Study hard. Live hard, love long, walk continually in the direction of your dreams, live the life you've imagined.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: The amount I loan has the potential to positively impact an individual, or community depending on that individuals services. Being able to contribute to that is a privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer hardware and software for a living, I also like music and the outdoors.

lender.name: Franck
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am working on pensions issues in France. My job consists in finding ways to get our system to work with as little deficit as possible.

lender.name: Annemieke
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe that this organization will help people in need and that is what the Lord commanded us to do!
lender.occupational_info: I teach math and science at a Christian school

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Ik had 't geluk om hier in Nederland geboren te worden. Een rijk land met talloze mogelijkheden. Ik realiseer me dat anderen elders op de wereld dat geluk vaak niet hebben. Om hen toch een beetje op weg te helpen lijkt me deze weg een prima manier en ik hoop dat velen dit ook zullen doen. Als iedereen in deze wereld, die het een beetje beter heeft dan de allerarmsten, dit op zou pakken.... dan zag de wereld er toch een stuk beter uit.....
lender.occupational_info: I'm not working anymore... My hobby is photography. You can contact me on: jvg@photo.net

lender.name: Francesco
lender.loan_because: I believe on giving a chance to each one’s entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: I can... and realize what a privilege it is, to being able to...

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: Why not? =)

lender.name: Susan & J.R.
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to realize their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work in schools to make sure they have the money and people needed to teach children. My husband drives a truck to deliver goods to stores and warehouses.

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: It's a way to encourage and help people recognize their inherent value and dignity while improving the lives of their families, communities and themselves through their own hard work and initiative.

lender.name: Joana
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone should have a chance to follow their dreams.

lender.name: Acts 4
lender.loan_because: We wanted to share out of the abundance God has given us. Inspired by Acts 4:32-35.

lender.name: Charles & Kolisa
lender.loan_because: We're glad to be able to help people help themselves in trying to make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired lottery technician and computer system builder. My wife grooms dog.

lender.name: Siri
lender.loan_because: I want to help. :)

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing the success of others.

lender.name: Zuinda
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and to show thanks I choose to help someone else in need.
lender.occupational_info: I speak to thousands of travelers coming into Chicago 5 or 6 days a week and try to make them feel like they are coming home.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have so much.
lender.occupational_info: I work on projects to build strong relationships with other countries.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: the way to ensure that people have healthcare in the world is to give them a way to earn money and support their families.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: this opportunity is absolutely amazing!
lender.occupational_info: I build big buildings.

lender.name: Supa Sparks
lender.loan_because: we believe that it is better to give than to receive, and that everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Dale & Dave
lender.loan_because: We have always been lucky and support the idea that every person on our planet.should have the opportunity to accomplish and prosper. Thank you to KIVA.org.
lender.occupational_info: We work on cartoon television shows.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Jane McQueeney
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should help people to better themselves. Sometimes a few dollars can make all the difference.
lender.occupational_info: My practice is focused on helping provide healthcare providers to come into compliance with the many rules and regulations the U.S.A.

lender.name: Clark & Katherine
lender.loan_because: We support people who create their own opportunities.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky to have a great job I love. I feel that giving and helping others just feels great.
lender.occupational_info: I handle large software installations and my main role is to keep everyone organized in the tasks required to do the project from start and planning through to people using the new system.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: It is a wonder that small and innovative solutions to large problems can have a profound impact.

lender.name: Borje
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit stories and newsreports in a local newspaper, a website (www.an.no) and a local tv-station.

lender.name: Bernhard
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I'm very keen on the "microcredit" principle and hope that I can help a little thanks to my loan.

lender.name: Cristóvão Mesquita
lender.loan_because: Lending makes me feel good. It’s a good idea to help others to do something

lender.name: Lise
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have a chance and need a break!

lender.name: Abe
lender.loan_because: It is one way to see how my money can help
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Mattie
lender.loan_because: We all get by with a little help from our friends.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Language Arts and English as a Second Language to middle school-aged students.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: saving one is saving the World. I feel that the smallest of donations can reflect an enormous change in someone's life. I have much and to give to those who are really trying to change their life should be one of our missions in this lifetime. I will continue to give to this fund and hope that all that receive use the funds to make life better for the world. To be able to assist someone in their dream or life sustaining efforts is truly an honor.
lender.occupational_info: I researched the legal sectors of many different areas of the law as it applied to societal needs. I also am 12 credits short of my BS in Elementary Education. I enjoy reading, working with the elderly and children and I want to do something with the third world country before I get too old. I know I can contribute my energy, love and knowledge to make the world a safer and beautiful place.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I wish to help, to participate in the the lives of others who ask for support and to do something for the welfare of this village Earth. Thank you for the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an airline looking after the parts and materials for the maintenance department and I do aircraft and artifact appraisal work under contract as well.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to reach their goals and potential.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families to make their relationships healthier.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way of giving oportunities of a better life to persons who need it!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I'm so happy to live in the USA where life is great. I would like to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am so happy to meet new people everyday from all different backrounds.

lender.name: Cristina Mesquita
lender.loan_because: i believe in entreprenership and that people can improve their lives if they are given a chance.

lender.name: Betsy Jo
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help high school students go on to college by day and am a want-to-be artist by night.

lender.name: Bjørn
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people build their own future, using their own skills.
lender.occupational_info: I am an craftsman, repairing old wood-buildings, in an small Norwegian museum.

lender.name: Ms. Whiffin
lender.loan_because: We are a grade 4/5 class at Anmore Elementary. We are learning about the world and how we can make a difference. We have been lending to Kiva now for over a year. In the first year, we raised over $1100 as a class. This year, we have already reloaned the money that has come back to us (approximately $775). My students this year have also embarked on their own fundraising efforts to give them a chance to connect to the project. Amazingly, they have raised over $1300 so far!!! The fun part is making the loan! Each of us chooses a project and researches the region, community and business to determine which project we will support. The kids are so aware of the world! They also use statistics to justify their decisions and have become amazing at working with all kinds of numbers. Hurray for Kiva!

lender.name: Team PAB
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to contribute goodness to deserving people.
lender.occupational_info: We help families grow.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: thanks to the support and encouragement of my my friends and family, I have been extremely blessed. I want to support others in realizing their dreams as well.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and blogs and stuff.

lender.name: Radhika
lender.loan_because: A small good deed is better than a big good intention. I know the anguish of being in need of money; today I have it; I want to share it.
lender.occupational_info: Working towards living life's true worth. Ever thought how beautiful the world will be if each one of us was truly humane towards just 1 fellow being ?

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: I have always been facinated by the possiblities of microcredit. For a relatively very tiny amount of capital you can help someone in the developing world to make a difference in their lives. When they repay the loan you can help someone else with the same capital!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. I focus on lean management techniques and processes data management at one of the top software companies in the world.

lender.name: Prad
lender.loan_because: Giving at the the right moment is more generous than giving much.

lender.name: Roland and Isabel
lender.loan_because: We loan because we must care for one another and Kiva is an international sharing of gifts program
lender.occupational_info: We are getting old at 73+ years. We are all one body,one great family.

lender.name: gerard
lender.loan_because: to give hard working poor people a chance for a better live.
lender.occupational_info: I help people on the road who are having car trubbels.

lender.name: Trish and Cami
lender.loan_because: We all need to help our neighbors.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to build a good life for themselves through hard work and the application of their passion.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in helping companies build their brand and image through marketing and design.

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to give people the means to work toward their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I train small business owners to keep a record of their finances so that they know where they are at and where they are going in their business.

lender.name: SSSCM
lender.loan_because: we want to give back and see our world grow. We know we are not the only people in this world that work hard and still need help.
lender.occupational_info: Mom = Teacher Dad = Digital Movie Engineer Kids = Students ages 6, 7 & 11

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achive their dreams in life. We should all try to be more helpful this way.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people every day that are trying to build a better life. It is very empowering and positive.

lender.name: Vasavi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people earn their own money.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 3rd grade student from Virginia. I am learning to dance and play the piano.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's fun.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit agency that helps people with mental illness to reclaim their lives.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: ~ Be kinder than necessary for everyone you meet is fighting some kind of battle ~

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have spent a lot of time in other countries and know that people have a whole lot less, and work a whole lot harder, than we do here.
lender.occupational_info: Yoga is a way of keeping your body healthy without medicine.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer, specialising in family portraiture but also working in other fields

lender.name: jenny rebecca
lender.loan_because: a little bit can go a long way. it feels good to have someone believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: I make photographs of things people want to buy.

lender.name: Rachna and Rachita
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to lend people a helping hand to help them stand on their own feet.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Part of venture capital is to provide the necessary funds to start-up enterprises in exchange for a piece of the company in the hope that it does well enough to realize financial gain. Here is a similar idea in a much more direct and heartfelt way. Giving a bit of assistance to a growing enterprise, not in search of financial return, but for the betterment of the world as a whole.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in large refineries around the world helping them improve their operations. Currently, I work in my company's venture capital division, investing in ideas and technology developed in start-up companies that can help improve operations and help sustain our future.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I can help people outside of my (usually) comfortable environment do things I take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I help keep companion animals (cats, dogs, birds, hamsters, etc.) healthy.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: By giving someone a hand up instead of a hand out we empower one another to build a better future for the world we live in.

lender.name: Hannah & Jared
lender.loan_because: hope is a powerful thing.
lender.occupational_info:
Human Resources - Working within the company department charged with finding, screening, recruiting and training job applicants, as well as administering employee-benefit programs.
US Government - Weapons repair/training

lender.name: UC EAP Regional Team
lender.loan_because: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it. -Albert Einstein
lender.occupational_info: Dedicated to programs in Asia and Africa

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Tiziana
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone a chance!

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: If I have the opportunity to help my neighbor, I should.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: i love the fact that i may only have a small amount of money myself but i can still make a massive difference in another persons life.

lender.name: Deidre
lender.loan_because: You can't keep it, if you don't give it away.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I AM A TRENDSETTER!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mathematics graduate student.

lender.name: Reza
lender.loan_because: it is a way for me to make at least a little difference in the world.

lender.name: Jenni
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower those trying to make an honest living for themselves and their families.

lender.name: David Taylor-Klaus
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending moves the global economy at the only level that works ... at the community level.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people facing change - either changing by choice or having change thrust upon them - to: • Focus on and define their core values, • Create Clarity around what is important to change, • Build an Action plan for forward motion, and • Provide support for them as they move forward.

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: Family Christmas Gift
lender.occupational_info: Insurance

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I belive in productivity. There should be no reason a person cannot access resources if they want to be a productive person in thier community. I believe in hard work and self determination, not laziness and apathy.

lender.name: J & the Boxers
lender.loan_because: others deserve the opportunity to improve their financial situation.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.occupational_info: Giving microloan recipients and other entrepreneurs the skills they need to make better business decisions

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior in High School in Hollister, California. I hope to go to college next year and study biology and then I hope to become a doctor one day.

lender.name: Veena.N.K
lender.loan_because: I am a Chef, a Food Consultant, Restaurant & a Food Critic. My motto is to 'Eradicate hunger from the world". I am willing to do my part. Whether it is by volunteering, by preparing and serving food and by donating as much as I can. Something about people going without food touches me a lot. I don't want to ever hear people suffering ever and not from hunger for sure. So I want to do my part and I strongly encourage other people to do their part as well.
lender.occupational_info: My specialty is Global, Asian, Vegetarian and Vegan food. I help people to change their lifestyles to adapt and to include healthier ways and nutritious food in their daily diet. I help organizations with menu planning, training employees to get them familiarized with the world of spices, to teach them to cook Asian food and show them how to combine and use the spices to their advantage.

lender.name: The Adams'
lender.loan_because: We want to show our children that you should help others if you are able.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to pass some of that on.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state's largest electric utility. I tell homeowners, developers, cities where they are going to place electric lines, poles, transformers.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I am excited by the opportunity to help someone better their own lives as well as their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor doing my residency training in Internal Medicine.

lender.name: miriam & saray
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to provide others with the opportunity to succeed and feel a sense of self-worth and self-actualization.

lender.name: Mark & Lori
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with enough to share.

lender.name: Regis Microlending Group
lender.loan_because: we are socially responsible students learning about international finance!
lender.occupational_info: We are students of international finance, and we are striving to explore issues of risk, credit, microlending, and the global economy. We will be graduating soon and are currently studying various fields within business.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to change their lives.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because:
Microcredit loans empower the poor to lift themselves out of poverty. Through microfinance, they can secure better nutrition, education, healthcare, and housing for their families.
The poor don't lack motivation, drive, or ability. They lack opportunity. There are millions and millions of impoverished people around the world who don't have access to financial services, and the faster we are able to get it to them, the better!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying business and minoring in international development. My hope is to use my major to empower women in developing countries!

lender.name: Christopher Robins RMT
lender.loan_because: I was helped to start my business and continue to be helped and inspired by my wonderful clients. It is in appreciation of their support that I show my gratitude to them by "paying it forward" The world is so full of wonderful people and places and Kiva allows us in some small way to reach out to those people and places. If all the hands that reach could touch....Peace.

lender.name: Dyk
lender.loan_because: I believe the imbalance in wealth in the world is morally wrong and this is a small way of redressing that.

lender.name: Rasmus
lender.loan_because: I expect to double my investment! .......... WHAT was that you said? Non-for-profit?
lender.occupational_info: I do what I do here at Kiva - lend money

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: without a loan I could never have got started in life
lender.occupational_info: I work to promote sustainability - to consider the environment, our natural capital and future generations in all that we do

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: nice to share
lender.occupational_info: Produce music concerts

lender.name: Siv
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I teach small children at a primary school.

lender.name: Hanne
lender.loan_because: I can! And this is a great way of making a little go a long way...
lender.occupational_info: Communication

lender.name: Einar & Anne-May
lender.loan_because: We have felt the hard times and long work hours building up a company and stabilising it (took almost 10 years starting from 0), thats why we admire people trying to make their own business and are more than happy trying to make their road to success hopefully a little bit easier.
lender.occupational_info: Started own company in 1996. The company has today 6-8 employees performing surface treatment, flooring and termoplastic coating. Our work is today manageing the company with all from getting contracts, safety & quality assurance, ordering products, as well as all the paperwork regarding payments, taxes etc.

lender.name: Constantinos
lender.occupational_info: I run a manufactory and retail shop with wigs for women and men.

lender.name: jujin
lender.loan_because: they deserve a better life.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: my work is successful ...

lender.name: Parent Advocates
lender.loan_because:
We are a group of citizen advocates. We are parents with disabled dependents and children with additional needs. We asked our family and friends to send Kiva gift certificates instead of cards and presents at Christmas.
We especially want to be connected with parents working to support their families. Every parent we have ever met simply wants their children to have a better childhood than their own childhood ever was. All children are our children! All children deserve this!
We have created a Kiva page on the Parent Advocates Together (PAT) website and our organisation now sponsors a number of Kiva loans. There is also a Facebook fan page for our group at http://www.facebook.com/pages/Parent-Advocates-Together/242685595777297?sk=wall so please do click this link and 'like' or page to show your support.
> We champion the needs of vulnerable individuals, disadvantaged communities and excluded groups. > We work to break the cycle of deprivation, to promote informed choices, and to encourage independence and self-efficacy. > We engage with commissioners, service providers and community stakeholders to develop beneficial outcomes for all citizens regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, age, disability, orientation or any other background.
lender.occupational_info:
We believe that people will achieve more by working together than they can by working alone. We support the efforts of those who seek success through that co-operative endeavour.
We believe that the only way to create a just and fair society is through power being spread evenly throughout society, and not arbitrarily based on wealth, class, gender or race.
